entities.name: norbert
entities.description: Norbert is described as a Norwegian Ridgeback, which is a breed of dog. He is also referred to as a baby, indicating that he is young.

relationships.description: Hagrid is caring for Norbert, as evidenced by the fact that he has packed and readied a crate for Norbert to be taken away.
Peeves is an obstacle that Harry and Hermione had to navigate in order to reach Hagrid's hut.
